meanings.definition: A person who strongly advocates a particular ideology.
meanings.sent1: The idealogues at the meeting passionately discussed their beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The idealogues in the group all supported the same political party.
meanings.sent3: The idealogues had a heated debate over their favorite sports team.
meanings.sent4: She was a true ideologue, unwavering in her dedication to environmental causes.
meanings.sent5: The idealogues' voices echoed through the hall, filled with conviction.

meanings.definition: A group of people who share a common set of beliefs or ideas.
meanings.sent1: The idealogues gathered every week to discuss their shared values.
meanings.sent2: The idealogues in the community worked together to promote equality.
meanings.sent3: The idealogues organized a charity event to help those in need.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a tight-knit circle of idealogues, always supporting each other.
meanings.sent5: The idealogues' unity was evident in their unwavering commitment to their cause.
